text: Of course!
With pleasure!
Gladly!
Yup, I'm down!
Sure, let's do this!
I was just about to say it myself!
Well, don't mind if I do.
Sure, if you're offering.
I guess I can spare an hour or so.
Never thought I'd ever find someone so eager like you. Let's do this.
Even Cataclysm can't change your ways, huh? Okay then.
No strings attached? Great.
This is really crazy, but aren't we all?
Aah, it's so much better like this...
//: these rely on whether speaker was never pregnant before, I can't check that currently
We might become parents with this, haha.
I hope we'll sort this all out so our children can live in a better world.
You know, before this I really hated children. But now my instincts tell me what we're doing is for the better.

text: Sure, but... uh, I never did this before.
I'm a virgin though, so... please be gentle with me.
I'm so nervous... Can you hold me?
Ah...! No, I'm fine, keep going...
It's my first time... I hope I'll do well.
Umm... It's my first... Will that be okay...?
D-Don't laugh! It doesn't matter if I did this before or not, right?!
Damn, I just hope it won't be too awkward.
Yeah, I need to do this at least once before I die.
It's... my first time, so... Sorry if... I'm not very good...
Don't worry, I'll be gentle.
It's okay, it only hurts first time.
It might hurt a bit, but you'll be fine.
You'll get used to it in no time.
You know where to put it, right? Here, I'll help you out.
What's wrong? You don't know what to do? Don't worry, I got it from here.
It's okay, just let your instincts guide you.
You'll become a fine man after this.
Don't worry, I'll take the lead.
S-Stupid! What are you saying out of the blue...? It's not like I'm against it or anything though...
Sure... Um... Quit staring and just do it...
Haah... Okay, make it quick.
J-Just hurry up already, <okay>?
I can't believe I'm doing this...
Hii... Please, just don't hurt me...
I'll do whatever you want...!
If that's what you're after... Fine, but don't hurt me, please!
Okay... Okay, calm down! Suit yourself... I just want to get out of this alive.
I'd hate to be raped... But I don't want to die either... Haah...
You're sick, you know that?! I hope it'll come back to bite you one day.
No, nooo! Why... Why?! Why is this happening to me...
This is inevitable, isn't it... Nothing is sacred after all...
I'll do it, okay?! Just don't hurt me...
Whatever you want, just please, have mercy...!
Yes... I suppose I don't have a choice.
With you? Uh, thanks but no thanks.
Are you sure we should be wasting our time like this?
Please spare me that.
That's a really inappropriate timing.
Shouldn't we worry about something more important?
Why would I? Do you think I'm so easy?
This is ridiculous.
Not happening.
Sorry, I'm not in the mood right now.
Desperate, are we?
No, we can't.
Are you crazy?! I'm more worried about survival, not this!
What the fuck?! Fuck off you <name_b>!
How about you go fuck yourself?
Go hump a tree you bugger.
Shut the fuck up!
Leave me alone!
Creeps have not gone extinct yet? Darn.
Why don't you ask a zombie instead? I'm sure they'd love that.
I should probably off a <name_b> like you on the spot to make this world a better place.
Seek help you sad <name_b>.
Keep dreaming sweetie.
Sorry, not this lifetime.
What the fuck is wrong with you?
Haa... Please, stay with me...
I love you...
I wish we could stay together like this...
No one will stop us together...
I'm so <happy> it's with you...
I don't want to lose you...
Well, that was fun, but I gotta go.
Thanks, that was refreshing. See ya.
That was not bad at all. Bye.
I'll be on my way now.
Just what I needed. It's time for me to go though.
Sweet. I'll take my leave now.
*Whimpers*
*Cries*
Why... Why...
I didn't want this...
Why me... Why me...
Hey!
Done already?
I'm not finished yet!
What's wrong?
Why did you stop?

//: keep these below until one day monsters can utilize snippets
text: Bah!
Aa-haaa!
What the--?!
Hey, it's the enemy!
We have contact!
Hostiles!
Ha! I see ya!
Hyahaaa!
I'm gonna twist your head off and make it my toy!
Hyahaaa! Fresh toy!
Hyahaaa! Fresh meat!
We're gonna feast on human flesh today!
It's raaaape tiiiiiime!
(Insane laughter)
HELL YEAH!
Give 'em hell!

//: 露骨なパロディネタはいちおう自粛。
殺しは初めてじゃないんだよ、新米！
何百回とやってきた！そうすれば変わるだろう！？
自分を制して、悪に徹しろ！
text: Hyahaaa!
Scared, huh?!
Come at me, <name_b>!
Blood! Blood! Blooooooooood!!!
Bleed for meeee!
You're nothiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiin'!
You got nothin' on me!
Rape and then kill? Or kill and then rape?  ...Both sound reaaaaaaaally nice!
I'll rape you, then kill you, and then rape you again!
Murder die kill!
I don't mind helpin' you out, you know?  ...After I'm done toyin' with ya, that is!
(Insane laughter)
(Roars)
(Howls)
(Growls)
Dieeeeeeeeeeeee!
Imma fuck you up!
I just want to play! You don't mind it, right?!
You little shit...
How are you still not dead?!
Why can't you just die?!
This ain't my first time killin', ya rookie!
If I can't live as a Human, then Demon life it is!
When you get to hell, tell 'em I sent ya!
When I kill you, I'll rape your corpse! Don't worry, I'll be gentle!
You're gonna be really fuckin' sorry!
(Clicks tongue)
That fella sure runs fast...
That <name_b> is hella fast, <swear>!
Come out, come out, wherever you are! I'm gonna end ya quick!
Stop hidin' and come out already!
Careful, that <name_b> is still hidin' nearby...
Stop runnin'!
Damn, where the fuck did he go?!
I see ya! No I don't... Yes I do! No I don't... Fuck!
Chicken, chicken, chicken... Chicken!
